content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to list the contents of the directory at "/path/to/directory" using the "execute_shell" command, but it returned an error message saying that the directory does not exist. I used the "read_file" command to read the contents of the file at "/path/to/file", which returned "This is the text to write to the file.This is the text to append to the file." I successfully used the "write_to_file" command to write "This is the new text to write to the file." to the file at "/path/to/file". I attempted to use the "replace_in_file" command again to replace "This is the text to write to the file." with "This is the new text to replace the old text with.", but it returned a message saying that no matches were found for "This is the text to write to the file." in the file.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/new_script.py", "text": "#!/usr/bin/env python\\n\\nprint(\'Hello, World!\')"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "python /path/to/new_script.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Hello, World!\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best places to visit in Europe"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/best-europe-vacations/", "https://www.touropia.com/best-places-to-visit-in-europe/", "https://www.cntraveller.com/gallery/places-to-visit-europe", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/ceciliarodriguez/2023/02/10/the-20-best-places-in-europe-to-visit-in-2023-according-to-european-best-destinations/", "https://santorinidave.com/best-cities-europe", "https://www.forbes.com/sites/ceciliarodriguez/2022/02/13/ready-for-europe-the-20-best-and-safest-places-for-travel-and-tourism--in-2022-according-to-european-best-destinations/", "https://tourscanner.com/blog/best-places-to-visit-in-europe/", "https://www.ourescapeclause.com/best-cities-to-visit-in-europe/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Python_(programming_language)", "question": "What is Python?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : an overview of the Python programming language, including its history, features, syntax, and various implementations. It highlights Python\'s versatility and popularity in a wide range of applications, such as scientific computing, web development, and artificial intelligence. The text also includes resources and references related to Python, such as books and software libraries.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: Error: read_file /path/to/file failed: no such file or directory', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": "This is the text to append to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "old_text": "old text", "new_text": "new text", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for old text in /path/to/file', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l /path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"ls: cannot access \'/path/to/directory\': No such file or directory\\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is the text to write to the file.This is the text to append to the file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "text": "This is the new text to write to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file", "old_text": "This is the text to write to the file.", "new_text": "This is the new text to replace the old text with.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: No matches found for This is the text to write to the file. in /path/to/file', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -l /path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb\'\'\nSTDERR:\nb"ls: cannot access \'/path/to/directory\': No such file or directory\\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "/path/to/directory"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "/path/to/file"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is the new text to write to the file. This is the text to append to the file.', type='action_result')]
"""
